com.b2international.snowowl.core.markers

Class MarkerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.b2international.snowowl.core.markers.MarkerManager

  • public class MarkerManager
extends Object
    Manages bookmark and problems markers.

      class  MarkerManager.MarkerChangeAdapter
      Empty MarkerManager.MarkerChangeListener implementation.

      Simplified interface for receiving batched notifications of resource marker related events.

      • bookmarkComponent

        public void bookmarkComponent(IIndexEntry entry,
                              Object message)

      • bookmarkComponent

        public void bookmarkComponent(Object object,
                              Object message,
                              long storageKey)
        Bookmarks a terminology independent component by creating a new marker with bookmark type and setting all other attribute of the marker related to the passed in object.

        Parameters:
        object - the component to bookmark. Should not be null.
        message - some human readable description of the bookmark. Can be null.

      • isBookmarked

        public boolean isBookmarked(Object object)
        Returns true if the passed in terminology independent component is bookmarked otherwise it returns with false. If no TerminologyComponentId could be found, and an exception is thrown, then exception is caught and false is returned.
        Parameters:
        object - the terminology independent component.
        Returns:
        true if the component is bookmarked, false if not.

      • isBookmarked

        public boolean isBookmarked(String terminologyComponentId,
                            String id)
        Returns true if the passed in component is bookmarked otherwise it returns with false.
        Parameters:
        terminologyComponentId - the terminology component type ID
        id - the component ID
        Returns:
        true if the component is bookmarked, false if not.

      • getAttributeSafe

        public static final <T> T getAttributeSafe(org.eclipse.core.resources.IMarker marker,
                                           String attributeName,
                                           Class<T> clazz)
        Retrieves an attribute of a marker instance based on the passed in attribute name. The return result will be casted to the required type based on the input clazz parameter.

        Note: This method does not throw exception when getting the attribute or casting attribute to the required type rather returns with null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the return value.
        Parameters:
        marker - the marker instance.
        attributeName - the name of the attribute.
        clazz - the class of required return type.
        Returns:
        the attribute persisted to the resource instance.

      • getAttributeSafe

        public static final <T> T getAttributeSafe(org.eclipse.core.resources.IMarkerDelta markerDelta,
                                           String attributeName,
                                           Class<T> clazz)
        Retrieves an attribute of a marker delta instance based on the passed in attribute name. The return result will be casted to the required type based on the input clazz parameter.

        Note: This method does not throw exception when getting the attribute or casting attribute to the required type rather returns with null.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type of the return value.
        Parameters:
        marker - the marker instance.
        attributeName - the name of the attribute.
        clazz - the class of required return type.
        Returns:
        the attribute persisted to the resource instance.

      • getMarkers

        public final <T> Collection<org.eclipse.core.resources.IMarker> getMarkers(String markerType,
                                                                           MarkerAttributeIdValuePair<T>... idValuePairs)
        Returns with all persisted marker identified by the passed in marker type where the examined attribute value of the marker equals with the passed in attribute value.

        Note: this method does not throws exception when working on persisted markers rather returns with an empty collection.
        Parameters:
        markerType - the type of the marker.(See: IMarker.getType())
        idValuePairs - the pair of the examined attribute id and value.
        Returns:
        a collection of matching persisted markers.

      • getMarkers

        public final <T> Collection<org.eclipse.core.resources.IMarker> getMarkers(String markerType,
                                                                           List<MarkerAttributeIdValuePair<T>> idValuePairs)

      • deleteMarker

        public void deleteMarker(org.eclipse.core.resources.IMarker... markers)
        Deletes a persisted marker. This method does nothing if the passed in marker is not a persisted one.
        Parameters:
        marker - the marker to delete.

      • deleteMarkersForComponent

        public <K> void deleteMarkersForComponent(Iterable<ComponentIdentifierPair<K>> identifierPairs)
        Deletes all persisted markers associated with the specified terminology component represented as a component identifier pairs.
        Parameters:
        identifierPairs - terminology independent components represented as ComponentIdentifierPairs.

      • deleteMarkersForComponent

        public <K> void deleteMarkersForComponent(ComponentIdentifierPair<K>... identifierPairs)
        Deletes all persisted markers associated with the specified terminology component represented as a component identifier pairs.
        Parameters:
        identifierPairs - terminology independent components represented as ComponentIdentifierPairs.

      • createValidationMarkerOnComponent

        public void createValidationMarkerOnComponent(Object object,
                                              IDiagnostic diagnostic)
        Creates a problem marker for a terminology independent component by creating a new marker with problem type and setting all other attribute of the marker related to the passed in object and the diagnostic. Updates and removes persisted markers if necessary.

        Parameters:
        object - the component to mark with a problem. Should not be null.
        diagnostic - information about the outcome of the component validation process.
